top_comments.comment: Can i record Some gta guns

Never get bored watching these vids, the way Jon is able to marry his love of firearms with a genuine liking of video games is so charismatic.  Would be awesome to see a 'reacts to' the DayZ guns albeit there's a lot to get through. Many thanks.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I think a game that does "You do better on semi-auto" really well is Killing Floor 2, especially with the AA12. Full auto is usually only beneficial when multiple bullet sponges show up, particularly Scrakes.
ah, Slamfire, i used to call this Taurus =)
Burned my hand with a 870 once....not a nice experience.
An optical sight on a shotgun is like putting pineapple on a pizza
Something he didn't address is the ejection port on the M16 and M4 don't move. That could also just be a console thing
Goes to show how Battlefield is a fine af game
You should have him do killing floor 2

For the AA12, the way I use it in game at least- is I tap fire it for semi automatic for a majority of the time due to the way ammo economy works. So imo it heavily benefits from not using full auto and wasting shells for single or small groups. But full auto is great for the bulkier special infected or for hordes.
Can i record Some gta guns

Would be great to see him do Left 4 Dead as well.
Oh, and DayZ.
Tbh, I would love to see Jonathan reacting to Payday 2 weapons
